DOC.brief_summary: Efficacy use GnRH antagonist treatment develop early-onset severe ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome cancel embryo transfer
DOC.brief_title: Gonadotropin Releasing Hormone Antagonist Treatment Early-onset Severe Ovarian Hyperstimulation Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Women develop earlyonset severe ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome control ovarian stimulation use long GnRH agonist protocol hCG trigger ovulation . Women short antagonist protocol . Women receive GnRH agonist trigger ovulation . Women embryo transfer .
